fields.label: List of Shortcodes
fields.message:
Count of Unique Providers

[provider_count]

Displays a count of unique providers that serve this particular city.

City Name

[city_name]

Displays the city name (e.g. Atlanta).

State Name

[state_name]

Displays the state name (e.g. GA).

Max Residential Download Speed in City

[max_residential_download_speed_in_city]

Displays the highest download speed for the city.

Provider with Max Residential Download Speed in City

[max_residential_download_speed_provider_in_city]

Displays the name of the provider with the highest download speed for the city.

Top Internet Provider

[top_internet_provider]

Displays the name of the top internet provider for a given city based on the number of tracts they service.

City Population

[city_population]

Displays the formatted population of the city.

Search by Zip

[search_by_zip text="Enter your zip code here"]

Displays linked text that shows a zip search box when clicked on. You may enter the text that will be shown.
